List<Join<Project,​User>> getUsersForProject​(Project project)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getUsersForProject

        @Query("from ProjectUserJoin j where j.project = ?1 and (CONCAT(j.user.firstName, \' \', j.user.lastName) like %?2% or j.user.username like %?2% or j.user.email like %?2%)")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Join<Project,​User>> getUsersForProject​(Project project,
                                                                                  String search,
                                                                                  org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Get a page of Users associated with a project.
        Parameters:
        project - the Project to get Users for.
        search - the string to filter on username
        page - the page request
        Returns:
        a page of users.

        Get Users for a Project that have a particular role
        Parameters:
        project - The project to find users for
        projectRole - The ProjectRole a user needs to have to be returned

      • getProjectJoinForUser

        Parameters:
        project - The project of the join
        user - The user of the join
        Returns:
        The relationship between the project and user
